inputs.description: Output file name. For AFNI format, provide prefix only, with no view+suffix needed. Filename for NIfTI format should have .nii attached.
inputs.name: Output filename prefix

inputs.description: Number of CPU cores for parallel processing
inputs.name: CPU cores

inputs.description: Model formulation through multilevel smoothing splines
inputs.name: Multilevel smoothing splines formulation

inputs.description: Specify the fixed effect components of the model
inputs.name: Linear mixed effect formula

inputs.description: Specify the random effect components of the model
inputs.name: Random effect formula

inputs.description: Identify quantitative variables (or covariates). The list with more than one variable has to be separated with comma without any other characters.
inputs.name: Quantitative variables

inputs.description: Process voxels inside this mask only.
inputs.name: Mask

inputs.description: Outlier removal bounds. Any values in the input data that are beyond the bounds will be removed and treated as missing.
inputs.name: Outlier removal bounds

inputs.description: Provide a data table so that predicted values could be generated for graphical illustration.
inputs.name: Prediction table

inputs.description: List the data structure with a header as the first line.
inputs.name: Data table

inputs.description: Use AFNI's C io functions, which is default.
inputs.name: C IO flag

inputs.description: Enable R to save the parameters in a file called .3dMSS.dbg.AFNI.args for debugging.
inputs.name: Debug args flag

inputs.description: Specify the column name that is designated for input files of effect estimate. Default is 'InputFile'.
inputs.name: Input file column name

inputs.description: Specify the factors for group comparisons.
inputs.name: Group comparison factors

inputs.description: Specify varying smoothing terms. Two components are required: the first one 'var' indicates the variable (e.g., subject) around which the smoothing will vary while the second component specifies the smoothing formulation.
inputs.name: Varying smoothing terms
